titles.title: To combat child human trafficking, and for other purposes.
To combat child human trafficking, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Education and Workforce, Energy and Commerce, and Financial Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
